FuncDef: This command defines the size of the window using a 100ms basedeciseconds. The time value is converted to a number of symbols for the underlying medium. Errors are accumulated until the end of the window. At the end of the window, the actual errors are compared to the thresholds to determine if a threshold has been crossed. There is no mid-window threshold checking. The window represents a unique non-overlapping period of time.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the number of 100ms increments in increments of 10 (full seconds). Values-10 to 600. ParamDefault: Default- 10
